title: PureFunds' Chanin Sees Non-Gaming Companies Adopting AR (Audio)
itunes:title: PureFunds' Chanin Sees Non-Gaming Companies Adopting AR (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Andrew Chanin, CEO of PureFunds, discusses investing in video gaming and drones, Nintendo earnings preview, and how augmented reality--spurred on by Pokemon GO!--will be used by all kinds of business going forward.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
